resources.string: Developed by: Joao Francisco B. S. Martins
This app is the result of the final assignment for Mobile Application Development 2015/2 module at University of West London.

This is your pocket doctor, with you wherever you are. With this app you can:

 • Easily get useful medical information on diseases and medications.
 • Find medical centres nearby and, maybe, save someone's life.

Get started by checking your options on the navigation drawer widget on the left side of your screen.
